title: Use dotnet self-contained deployment
author: o-l-a-v
body_snippet:
Instead of requiring users to install the correct dotnet runtime, consider using a self-contained deployment.

* <https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/deploying/#publish-self-contained>

Paint.NET has used this since v4.3 released September 2021:

* <https://forums.getpaint.net/topic/118660-paintnet-43-is-now-available/>

Yes, installer will become bigger. But it's arguably worth it vs. all troubleshooting and scenarios one have to think about.
